root: ^The old man says: "Hello mister, how can I help you?"

c-0: ^ You ask: "Hey do you know what kinds of rocks there are?"
^He responds: "Yes, there are three main types of rock: Igneous, Sedimentary, and matamorphic"
c-1: ^ You ask: "Hey, got any cool facts about earths layers?"
^He responds: "Yes, the mantle makes up the largest percentage of earth's volume at 84%"
c-2: ^ You ask: "Hey, what is the word for the study of rocks again?"
